examples: she had strayed from the path of conventional behavior
a conventional view of the world

definitions.text: (weapons) using energy for propulsion or destruction that is not nuclear energy
represented in simplified or symbolic form
in accord with or being a tradition or practice accepted from the past
examples: a conventional church wedding with the bride in traditional white

definitions.text: rigidly formal or bound by convention
examples: their ceremonious greetings did not seem heartfelt
